content: double_crochet of previous row repeat from * to end turn contact juliavaconsin@gmail com © 2010 julia vaconsin 12 row 3 chain 3 double_crochet 2 in first st single_crochet of previous row single_crochet 1 in 3rd double_crochet of previous row *double_crochet 5 in next single_crochet of previous row single_crochet 1 in 3rd double_crochet of previous row repeat from * to end including last 5-double_crochet- shell double_crochet 3 in top of turning chain of previous row turn repeat row 2 and 3 two more times fasten_off with rs of work facing reattach yarn in 4th st from upper corner of left front neck opening chain 3 double_crochet 2 in same st work a second lace panel the same as for the right front panel ending row 1 with 3 double_crochet in last st at bottom corner of left front neck opening finishing sew bottoms of front panels to front block all pieces to measurements close shoulder and side seams using your preferred method i used a crocheted slip_stitch for the side seams and a sewn back stitch for the shoulder seams neck edging with rs facing rejoin yarn in upper corner of shell patt of right front work 12 single_crochet evenly over top edge of right front shell panel single_crochet an even number of sts evenly around neck edge ending with 12 single_crochet over top edge of left front shell panel turn next row chain 1 single_crochet across turn picot row chain 4 skip first st single_crochet 1 * chain 3 slip_stitch in 1st of those chain sts skip 1 single_crochet 1 repeat from * to last 2 sts chain 4 skip 1 slip_stitch in last st fasten_off armhole edging rejoin yarn at underarm single_crochet evenly around arm opening slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join round picot round chain 1 single_crochet 1 * chain 3 slip_stitch in 1st of those chain sts skip 1 single_crochet 1 repeat from * around join with round with a slip_stitch fasten_off repeat armhole edging for second armhole weave ribbon through front panels in a criss cross shoelace pattern as shown in sample starting at the bottom and ending through chain-4-space at top of neck opening contact juliavaconsin@gmail com © 2010 julia vaconsin 13 contact juliavaconsin@gmail com © 2010 julia vaconsin 14
